data.name: smile-detector-app
data.description: Smile Detection App developed using python. It uses OpenCV library. This project will detect the smiling faces automatically in the webcam. When we run the project, it will open webcam and start detecting the faces.

data.name: Project Conqueror
data.description: Conqueror is a Open Source Project. It is an Operating System developed using Linux Kernel. The Languages used in this project is Programming in C, x86_64 Assembly Language and Makefile. The development is in Low-level format.

data.name: Amazon Clone
data.description: This is a Clone website of amazon.com. This website is created using React JS. It displays the items list, you can add them to your cart and later you can delete them from the cart. It has a real time login data. The real cash payment is fetched from stripe.com.

data.name: Voice-Assist-AI
data.description: Virtual Voice Assistant designed in Python. It will perform operations such as Web browsing, searching information in wikipedia, directly opens websites, calculates the age, etc..
